where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( fas <* fill_area_style | NOT ( SIZEOF ( fas . fill_styles ) = 1 ) ) ) = 0

rule.name: fill_area_style_unique_constraint
rule.algorithm: LOCAL r : BAG OF fill_area_style := QUERY ( r <* fill_area_style | TRUE ) ; pass : BOOLEAN := TRUE ; name_bag : BAG OF string := [ ] ; END_LOCAL ; REPEAT i := 1 to SIZEOF ( r ) by 1 ; IF EXISTS ( r [ i ] \ fill_area_style . name ) THEN IF ( r [ i ] \ fill_area_style . name IN name_bag ) THEN pass := FALSE ; ESCAPE ; ELSE name_bag := name_bag + r [ i ] \ fill_area_style . name ; END_IF ; END_IF ; END_REPEAT ;
